Comment: I take into account the average most optimal way to enter in the data. There are four varientes for this problem: Both teams score 3 digit points, both teams score 2 digit points, 1 team scores 2 digit points & 1 scores 3 digit poitns, So I chose the scenario where 1 team scores 2 digit points & 1 scores 3 digit points as the average case scenario.
